programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: 57 Seconds

programme.title: Five Nights at Freddy's
programme.desc: Mike Schmidt accepts a position as night-time security guard at the abandoned pizzeria, where families used to flock in their droves in the 1980s. He is desperate to earn money to keep a roof over the head of his younger sister Abby, but is soon locked in a fight for survival. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. programme.title: The Canterville Ghost

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: Historical drama starring Frank Langella and Michael Sheen. For three years after leaving the White House in disgrace following the Watergate scandal, former US President Richard Nixon has remained silent on the matter. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. programme.title: Open Films: Stenson 2016
programme.desc: The official film of The 2016 Open Championship, held at Royal Troon in Scotland. This enthralling tournament saw a fascinating final-day duel, and a maiden Major winner.

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Pittsburgh Steelers host the Cleveland Browns at Acrisure Stadium in week two of the 2023 NFL season. Cleveland opened the season with a 24-3 victory over the Bengals. (18.09).

programme.title: England v W Indies 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: The fifth and final day of the opening Test in a three-match series at Lord's between England and the West Indies. (14.07).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Rozanski v Okolie
programme.desc: The WBC world bridgerweight championship is on the line as Lawrence Okolie makes his long-awaited return to challenge Lukasz Rozanski at the Podpromie Arena in Rzeszow, Poland. (24.05).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The New York Giants host the Green Bay Packers for Monday Night Football action from week 14 of the NFL season. Before their bye week, the Giants defeated a hapless Patriots 10-7. (11.12).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Inoue v Nery
programme.desc: The undisputed world super-bantamweight title is on the line in Tokyo, as the formidable Japanese star Naoya Inoue defends his crown against Mexico's Luis Nery. (06.05).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The Miami Dolphins host the Tennessee Titans in the NFL. (11.12).

programme.title: Hungarian F1 GP Highlights 2015
programme.desc: The 2015 Hungarian Grand Prix from the Hungaroring in Budapest. Brits Lewis Hamilton and Jenson Button have excelled in this race since 2006, winning it six times between them.

programme.title: Hungarian F1 GP Highlights 2016
programme.desc: The 2016 Hungarian Grand Prix from the Hungaroring, Mogyoród. Nico Rosberg starts on pole after narrowly beating out Lewis Hamilton in qualifying.

programme.title: WTA Final: Madrid
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion. (04.05).

programme.title: ATP Final: Madrid
programme.desc: A men's singles champion is crowned in the Spanish capital, as the world number eight Andrey Rublev faces Felix Auger-Aliassime, who appears in his first Masters 1000 final. (05.05).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: Josh Allen and Buffalo challenge Super Bowl champions Kansas City in the NFL. Kansas still lead the AFC West, but fell behind three others for the top seed in defeat to the Packers. (10.12).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Anderson v Merhy
programme.desc: From Texas, hard-hitting heavyweight hope Jared Anderson puts his unbeaten record on the line against fellow contender Ryad Merhy. (14.04).

programme.title: Hungarian F1 GP Highlights 2018
programme.desc: The 2018 Hungarian Grand Prix from the Hungaroring. Lewis Hamilton starts on pole following a superb qualifying session, while Sebastian Vettel starts in fourth.

programme.title: Hungarian F1 GP Highlights 2019
programme.desc: The Hungarian Grand Prix at the Hungaroring. Max Verstappen starts at the front of the grid after securing a career-first pole, with Valtteri Bottas second and Lewis Hamilton third.

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Jalen Hurts and the 10-3 Philadelphia Eagles go to the Seattle Seahawks during week 15 of the NFL season. For the first time since October 2021, Hurts has lost consecutive games. (18.12).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Kholmatov v Ford
programme.desc: Uzbek phenom Otabek Kholmatov faces off against American standout Raymond Ford for the vacant WBA featherweight world title in Verona, New York. (03.03).

programme.title: Secrets of Success: Jurgen Klopp
programme.desc: Nasser Hussain meets Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp to find out how he restored the Merseyside club's standing among the Premier League and European elite.

programme.title: Secrets of Success: Emma Hayes
programme.desc: Nasser Hussain meets serial winner Emma Hayes to find out how she has become one of the most successful managers in the women's game.

programme.title: England v W Indies 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day one of the second Test match between England and the West Indies at Trent Bridge. (18.07).

programme.title: Hungarian F1 GP Highlights 2023
programme.desc: Rekindling memories of an unforgettable 2021 season, Lewis Hamilton has pole position with Max Verstappen joining the Mercedes man on the front row at the 2023 Hungarian Grand Prix. (23.07).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Tampa Bay Buccaneers host the 2-0 Philadelphia Eagles in week three of the 2023 NFL. The Eagles return to action with a 2-0 record following victory over the Vikings previously. (25.09).

programme.title: T20 Blast Final 2014
programme.desc: A look back at a classic clash from the T20 Blast. Here, the dramatic 2014 final between the Birmingham Bears and Lancashire Lightning at Edgbaston.

programme.desc: The final of the 2015 T20 Blast, as Lancashire Lightning and Northamptonshire Steelbacks went head to head at Edgbaston to be crowned champions.

programme.desc: A look back at a classic clash from the T20 Blast. Here, the dramatic 2018 final between the Worcestershire Rapids and the Sussex Sharks at Edgbaston.

programme.desc: Following the conclusion of day one's play at The 152nd Open, enjoy a recap and the latest reaction to all the action from Royal Troon in Scotland.

programme.title: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer Darren Clarke
